ygData.msgSnippet: i TOTALLY put enough space in to walk around unless you are a medium or large slime. you know why i ignored the space requirements of medium and large slimes?

i TOTALLY put enough space in to walk around unless you are a medium 
or large slime. you know why i ignored the space requirements of 
medium and large slimes? because slimes are ridiculous, a, and you 
can always grow and split down to a small slime, b.

the time freeze thing is MEANT to be a challenge. some teams won't be 
able to defeat the mages, it appears, i suggest changing up your team 
or something.

like i said before, i playtested all my scenarios with a soldier 
taken through the legitimate levels. he managed to get through and 
get through handily. tell me what your team is, and i'll check it 
out. have to say, though, i'm not a big fan of teams, two people is 
generally my upper limit.

Oldschool
